name: Major Tom and the Radius of Outer Space
name_original: Major Tom and the Radius of Outer Space
description:
This is a vertical slice tech demo made in 78 hours for a hackaton  with the idea to prototype an educational adventure game full of sci-fi pop culture and david bowie vibe.

you can try the demo here: http://majortom.zeroattentionspan.net

Credits:

Martin Bakardzhiev - game design, art

Katerina Vaseva - development
